General.Name: SBS Contents Hub Co. Ltd
General.Description: SBS Contents Hub Co., Ltd. engages in the content distribution business in South Korea and internationally. The company also offers dramas, entertainment, sports, Power FM, Love FM, podcast, news, series, radio, scripted and non-scripted formats, and cultural content. In addition, it is involved in the IP-based and music businesses. The company was formerly known as SBSI Co. Ltd. and changed its name to SBS Contests Hub Co., Ltd. in 2009. SBS Contests Hub Co., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
General.Address: 82 SBS Prism Tower, Seoul, South Korea

3.Name: Yeong-Hwa  Kong
